text: Beauty and fullness of tone can be achieved by having the whole orchestra play with high clarinets and a carefully selected number of piccolos.
author: Gustav Mahler

text: I think the beauty of working with young people is they remind you of the spirit of acting and it's just a big play.
author: Eric Bana

text: I am obsessed with beauty. I want everything to be perfect, and of course it isn't. And that's a tough place to be because you're never satisfied.
author: Robert Mapplethorpe

text: The beautiful seems right by force of beauty and the feeble wrong because of weakness.
author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning
